name: PROMPT_EXECUTION_STATE
description: Tracks various intermediate and final state of the prompt chain execution.

columns.name: AI_INTRCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the interaction record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: RUN_ID_STATE
columns.description: A unique ID that identifies an individual execution of the model or agent. This should always correspond to a valid run ID from item 2000

columns.name: ENTITY_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Tracks the status of the associated run.

columns.name: REFERENCE
columns.description: A unique ID to identify a task that is generated by an AI agent

columns.name: TASK_DESC
columns.description: Description of the task generated by an AI agent.

columns.name: ENTITY_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: An action that is generated by the AI Agent
entries: Order or schedule a lab test
Order or schedule an imaging procedure
Provide clinical advice or treatment recommendations
Research, search for, or consult with specialists
Forward to the front desk for scheduling
Forward to the insurance or billing department
Acknowledge or empathize with the patient

columns.name: ENTITY_TEXT
columns.description: An input parameter for the action in item 3013.

columns.name: ENTITY_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: Either model-generated or system-mapped user-friendly name for the action/task

columns.name: ENTITY_SYN
columns.description: Synonyms to use when searching for data to display in a review action
